title: Add primary CTA button linking to YouTube in Why Choose Us section

requirements.summary: Add a primary-style “See Why Choose Us” CTA button under the Why Choose Us paragraph that links to the specified YouTube URL.
acceptanceCriteria: On the rendered page, in the “Why Choose Us” section, a button labeled “See Why Choose Us” appears below the specified paragraph text and above the feature cards grid.
The new button uses the same styling as the site’s existing primary CTA buttons (visual style consistent with the primary CTA used in the hero).
Clicking the new button navigates to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=68lltMKke6E.
The button remains responsive across the defined breakpoints (mobile 320–767px, tablet 768–1023px, desktop 1024px+) and maintains at least a 44x44px touch target.
The button has accessible focus styling consistent with other CTAs and does not break existing layout/spacing in the section.

file_operations.description: Insert a new primary-style CTA (label exactly “See Why Choose Us”) directly under the existing paragraph text and above the features grid, linking to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=68lltMKke6E; reuse the same Tailwind class set as the hero’s primary CTA to ensure consistent styling, focus-visible ring behavior, and min-h-[44px] touch target, while keeping the section responsive and not altering existing copy.
